author: Shaurya Malwa
title: Bitcoin Nears $108K as Fed Rate Cut Bets Rise; Traders Eye Ether, Solana, Cardano
description: Bitcoin reclaimed $107,000 as retail and institutional flows return, with Powell’s rate-cut hints and risk-on sentiment lifting crypto markets.
content:
Shaurya is the Co-Leader of the CoinDesk tokens and data team in Asia with a focus on crypto derivatives, DeFi, market microstructure, and protocol analysis.
